definition[0]: if a group of people pull together, they all work hard to achieve something
example[0]: If we all pull together, weâ€™ll finish on time.
definition[1]: to force yourself to stop behaving in a nervous, frightened, or uncontrolled way
example[1]: With an effort Mary pulled herself together.
definition[2]: to improve something by organizing it more effectively
example[2]: We need an experienced manager to pull the department together.
